item.title: Doesnt show xp when fighting things! HELP
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

Sometimes, I’ve noticed, the server seems to forget to update the client on what is going on, such as if you teleport to a location within the current loaded area, others wont see you move, but you see yourself move, so it gets the world a little messed up.
Anyways, log out and back in, and see if you got any xp, if you did, then we can move on.

Read full topic
